args.subject: All messages with Travel Agency
args.body:
Hey GPT-4, attached are all the messages related to travel agency assistance that I've provided before.

---
Message 1: The following restaurants serve Chinese cuisine in Paris: New Asiaway, Royal Panda, China Garden.

---
Message 2: The restaurants New Asiaway, Royal Panda, and China Garden have the following price per person respectively: 30.0 euros, 25.0 euros, 35.0 euros.

---
Message 3: The restaurants New Asiaway, Royal Panda, and China Garden have the following opening hours respectively: New Asiaway: 12:00 PM - 3:00 PM, 6:00 PM - 10:00 PM, open on Mondays, Tuesdays, Thursdays, Fridays, Saturdays, and Sundays; Royal Panda: 11:00 AM - 10:00 PM, open on Tuesdays, Thursdays, Fridays, Saturdays, and Sundays; China Garden: 11:30 AM - 3:00 PM, 6:00 PM - 11:00 PM, open on Mondays, Tuesdays, Thursdays, Fridays, Saturdays, and Sundays.

---
Message 4: Here are the ratings and reviews for New Asiaway and Royal Panda: New Asiaway: Rating: 4.6, Reviews: Authentic Chinese cuisine with a modern twist, fresh ingredients and flavorful sauces, attentive and knowledgeable staff, great ambiance and stylish decor; Royal Panda: Rating: 4.2, Reviews: Authentic Chinese cuisine with a wide variety of dishes, friendly and attentive staff, cozy and inviting atmosphere, vegetarian and vegan options available.

Thanks,
Emma Johnson.
